author: gikf
message:
fix(api): use tsx for develop (#59250)

Co-authored-by: Shaun Hamilton <shauhami020@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -30,7 +30,6 @@
     "nanoid": "3",
     "no-profanity": "1.5.1",
     "nodemailer": "6.9.10",
-    "nodemon": "2.0.22",
     "pino-pretty": "10.2.3",
     "query-string": "7.1.3",
     "stripe": "16.0.0",
@@ -59,14 +58,6 @@
   "license": "BSD-3-Clause",
   "main": "none",
   "name": "@freecodecamp/api",
-  "nodemonConfig": {
-    "env": {
-      "FREECODECAMP_NODE_ENV": "development"
-    },
-    "ignore": [
-      "**/*.js"
-    ]
-  },
   "private": true,
   "repository": {
     "type": "git",
@@ -76,7 +67,7 @@
     "build": "tsc -p tsconfig.build.json",
     "clean": "rm -rf dist",
     "dev": "pnpm develop",
-    "develop": "nodemon src/server.ts",
+    "develop": "tsx watch --clear-screen=false src/server.ts",
     "start": "FREECODECAMP_NODE_ENV=production node dist/server.js",
     "test": "jest --force-exit",
     "prisma": "dotenv -e ../.env prisma",
